resources.string: It\'s very easyâ€¦ \nThe Angry Squirrel won\'t tell you anything!
The facts have not yet been discovered by you.\nWin and discover information!
Depending on the type of game, the direction of movement when collecting matters:

Application MyTag it is an information and entertainment project. 
Here you will train your mind and learn a lot of interesting facts about funny squirrel animals! 

Application version: 1.0 
Date: 08.2023 
Developer: Belitski Marat 
email: belitski.dev@gmail.com

RULES OF GAME "TAG": 

By moving the knuckles across the field, arrange them by numbers, preferably by doing, 
as little movement as possible. 

At the end of the batches with the size of the 4x4 fields, you will be told an interesting fact about proteins! 
You will be able to discover 10 interesting facts for passing the SNAKE game type and 10 facts for passing the CLASSIC game type! 
If you finish a batch of 3x3 sizes, then the harmful squirrel will not tell you anything - do not be offended by it! 
Win and learn more interesting facts about animals! 

The playing field will be presented with randomly placed knuckles. Your task is to move the shapes 
achieve the result shown below. 
The complexity of the game is affected by the size of the playing field. 
There are several types:
